name: Publicly Accessible Alibaba ApsaraDB Instances
query: query { dbInstances ( where: { cloudProvider: "alibaba" publicAccessBlocked: false hasWhitelistConfig: { hasSecurityRule_SOME: { sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0" } } }){ identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory } }
